description:
After hearing of blood brother Inugane`s lucrative idol business, New York mafia boss Steve sends one of his own soldiers to join the Gokudols.
Source: Netflix

titles.title: Eikou Naki Shousha / Otoko Hore / Japanese Dream / Don to Oyabun / Kazoku no Kizuna / Goku Dolls Higaisha no Kai nite
栄光なき勝者 / 男惚れ / ジャパニーズ・ドリーム / ドンと親分 / 家族の絆 / ゴクドルズ被害者の会にて
